targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_usd AS "btc_usd"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1d),
  avg(bitmex_total_24h) AS "Bitmex",
  avg(binance_total_24h) AS "Binance",
  avg(current_24h) AS "Total"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1d)

panels.title: PNL - Total vs. Bitmex vs. Binance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pnl AS "btc_usd"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_24h AS "btc_usd"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  total_market_cap AS "btc_usd"
FROM global
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), timestamp)/60)*-1 FROM portfolio ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_1d AS "BTC 1D"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_12h AS "ETH 12H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_2h AS "BTC 2H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_2h AS "ETH 2H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_4h AS "BTC 4H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_4h AS "ETH 4H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_unrealised FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_btc_position FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_eth_position FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_8h AS "BTC 8H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_8h AS "ETH 8H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_usd AS "btc_usd"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT COUNT(current_24h) AS "metric" FROM pnl LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  COUNT(current_24h) AS "metric"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  current_24h >= 0
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  COUNT(current_24h) AS "metric"
FROM pnl
WHERE
  current_24h < 0
LIMIT 1;

SELECT w.wins/t.total AS "metric"
FROM (SELECT COUNT(pnl.current_24h) AS "total" FROM pnl LIMIT 1) as t, (SELECT COUNT(pnl.current_24h) AS "wins" FROM pnl WHERE pnl.current_24h >= 0 LIMIT 1) as w;

SELECT
  btc_dominance AS "BTC",
  eth_dominance AS "ETH",
  (100 - btc_dominance - eth_dominance) AS "ALT"
FROM global

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_12h AS "BTC 12H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_12h AS "ETH 12H"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_unrealised_percentage FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_btc_position_percentage FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT timestamp as "time", bitmex_eth_position_percentage FROM portfolio ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  btc_1d AS "BTC 1D"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  eth_1d AS "ETH 1D"
FROM ucts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,30m),
  avg(current) AS "Total"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,30m)

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  current_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  bitmex_total_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_24h
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total_1w
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_total
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_total_btc
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_1d
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  atari_7d
FROM portfolio
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,6h),
  avg(bitmex_total_24h) AS "Bitmex",
  avg(binance_total_24h) AS "Binance",
  avg(current_24h) AS "Total"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,6h)
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM binance_balances;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM binance_balances WHERE balance >= 15;
SELECT usdt.t/total.t FROM (SELECT balance as t FROM binance_balances ORDER BY t DESC LIMIT 1) as usdt, (SELECT SUM(balance) as t FROM binance_balances) as total;
SELECT value as metric FROM fng ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT confidence as metric FROM cbbi ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  binance_total AS "Binance",
  bitmex_total AS "Bitmex",
  atari_total AS "Atari"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT currency as Currency, ROUND(balance,0) as Balance, m.`1d_price_change_pct` as "24H", m.`7d_price_change_pct` as "1W" FROM binance_balances b JOIN marketcap m on b.currency = m.symbol WHERE balance >= 15 ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(current) AS "Total",
  avg(btc_usd) AS "BTC"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(current/btc_usd) AS "Binance / Bitmex"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg(binance_total) AS "Binance",
  avg(bitmex_total+COALESCE(bitmex_unrealised, 0)) AS "Bitmex"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,1h),
  avg((bitmex_total+COALESCE(bitmex_unrealised, 0))/binance_total) AS "Binance / Bitmex"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  confidence AS "CBBI"
FROM cbbi
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value AS "FNG"
FROM fng
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,8h),
  avg(btc_usd) AS "BTC"
FROM portfolio
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,8h)

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  currency AS metric,
  balance
FROM binance_balances
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  balance >= 60
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT currency as Currency, ROUND(balance,0) as Balance, ROUND(amount,1) as Amount, b.price as Price, m.`1d_price_change_pct` as "24H", m.`7d_price_change_pct` as "1W" FROM binance_balances b JOIN marketcap m on b.currency = m.symbol WHERE balance >= 20 ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT id as "Rank", rank_delta as Delta, symbol as Symbol, name as Name, price as Price, marketcap as Marketcap, marketcap_dominance as Dominace, 1d_price_change_pct as 1D, 7d_price_change_pct as 1W, 30d_price_change_pct as 1M, 7d_volume_change_pct as "1W vol", 30d_volume_change_pct as "1M vol" FROM marketcap ORDER BY id;
